attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in Boris Johnson handling of Afghanistan withdrawal
attributes.additional_details: Vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson as PM.
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister and selected cabinet have failed completely with the handling of the UK withdrawal from Afghanistan.

With little concern they have allowed 20 years of sacrifice to be overturned and 1000s will suffer and die as a result.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
